## removeNodeAtPosition variable

Returns a `delete` transaction that removes a node at a given position with the given `node`<!-- -->. `position` should point at the position immediately before the node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeNodeAtPosition: ({ pos, tr }: RemoveNodeAtPositionParams) => import("prosemirror-state").Transaction<any>
```
